parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I’m Santos Manchay Castillo from the village of Quilán

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: that belongs to the province of Huancabamba.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: when the sterilisation programme campaign came to the village.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I had the operation because I had 8 children already.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and the nurses would tell me that I had too many children.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: Because of that I had the operation,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: thinking that I would be fine.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: But it didn’t turn out like that.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: All of the women who had the sterilisation operation

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: have ended up in a bad way.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: That’s why we are here today in this meeting,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: thanks to the ladies who have come,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: so we can learn and not be so embarrassed anymore.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: Here in Huancabamba we are not used to speaking like this,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: That’s why we are grateful that the ladies have come to teach us.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: We can say that it did not turn out well.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: That’s why we are asking for some help.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: Maybe one day there could be a medicine,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: or some help to support until the time comes for God to take us.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: We are at this meeting so we can move forward.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I had the operation, they made me have the operation,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: We are asking for some help.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: We want medicine or something else that could help us.
